name: Air Italy S.p.A.
goal: Provide national and international Air Transport Services for passenger, cargo and mail
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: EU Aviation policy and related dossiers as well as regulations affecting the international aviation matters as the strategy and discussions for the framework for the future of the aviation field - main focus on the EU Aviation Relations with Third Countries
